name: Mavrikos Luxury Villas - Romi, Klea, Kaly, Pearl

reviews.text: We are currently staying in Villa Romi which is the larger three-bedroom villa. We are a family of five (children ages 4,2,9 month). Our friends are in Villa Kaly, two doors down. Both villas have WIFI although it is not very strong.
reviews.title: A peaceful location with an incredible view

reviews.text: The villas are situated on a cliff. Incredible views. There is no direct access to any beach as far as we can see. We did walk up the road to Zante camping and down the beach that way. Motorists tend to speed down that road so be aware. We ate dinner there but were not very impressed.
reviews.title: villa klea, wonderful !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Villa Kaly Nice but not great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Villa Romi is the largest. The pool is the shade a lot so tends to be colder than the other villas. Also the outdoor layout at this villa is not as convenient as the others with the BBQ squashed in a corner next to the pool. However I would say the view is the best from here as there are no trees directly in front. Also there is a lot of outdoor space and parking is easy here. It seems to be more private than the middle two villas. Villa Pearl also seems more private.
reviews.title: Absolutely amazing villa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Plenty of plates, cutlery, cooking utensils. There is a baby bed but no high chair. There is a washing machine but no dish washer which I find strange. They should move the washing machine upstairs to the large bathroom and install a dishwasher. However it's not that big of a deal. Upstairs there is a large bathroom with just a corner jacuzzi, toilet and sink. There is a lot of wasted space. The small bathroom down stairs has a shower, sink and toilet.
reviews.title: Dont Delay - Book today

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Villa Klea is a detached villa in a row of four, set on the side of a hill. It offers breath taking views out over the Ionian Sea and towards Cephalonia. The villas are signposted off the main road and down a dirt track. They are nestled peacefully between olive groves and the coast, with very little passing traffic, sea or otherwise. The silence is occasionally interrupted by a passing plane. This was a little disconcerting at first, but we soon grew accustomed to it and became avid plane spotters. If I had known this prior to our trip, it may have put me off booking, so with hindsight I am glad I didn't know.
reviews.title: Villa Klea
Luxury
reviews.text: We found the Villa spacious, contemporary and larger than expected. The photos on the website are dated, as the furniture has been upgraded, so do not do it justice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front door opened into the downstairs open-plan living space, with a kitchen/diner and lounge.
reviews.title: Villa Romi

reviews.text: Kitchen: Washing machine, large fridge /freezer (ice was provided), sink (with sea view) and built in cupboards. The kitchen although not terribly well equipped and I would not describe it as luxury, it was more than adequate, with lots of plates, cooking utensils, sharp knives and mugs. Only three table knives, but around two dozen mugs!
reviews.title: Fantastic location and accomodation we had a great time and would 100% recomend this holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If self-catering I thought it lacked storage containers, oven gloves and pots with lids. I would recommend taking some foil and a couple of sandwich bags. A dish cloth, cloth and washing up liquid were provided. You may want to take a sponge (pot scourer) and also some washing capsules if you want to do laundry. Also a bar of soap may come in handy and some paper towels. All can be purchased locally, but it may save you from buying large quantities if you bring some of these things from home. Note there is no dishwasher.
reviews.title: Another Great Holiday at Villa Kaly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed in the villa romi what a brilliant location very private and everything you need beautiful pool and pool area with barbecue and inside fully equiped luxery kitchen and luxury lounge area with tv not that you need a tv with the fantastic veiws you can sit out at night and watch the sun set.The maid comes every other day her name is alexia and she is very friendly there are 3 bedrooms all with balconys over looking the sea the villa is 1 of 4 and are all very private so if you want to go with family and friends you could book all 4 villas and spend time together and have your own private space the villas are located in tragaki but only a short distance from busy tsilivi each villa has car parking spases and i advise hiring a car because zante is the most beautiful island you could ever wish to visit and there is lots to see and these villas are in the perfect location for getting out and about you can book these villas on the mavrikos website there names are romi,pearl,klea and kaly choose any one and have an unforgetable holiday i can assure you that you will want to go back.
reviews.title: fabulous holiday

reviews.text: I absolutely disagree witht the above opinion
reviews.title: thank you for a lovely staying!!

reviews.text: i stayed with my wife and our 2 chrildren in villa Romi
reviews.title: Building in progress, noisy day and night, not advisable for people with babies.

reviews.text: The location was wonderfull..the equipment was lovely and all the people around were friendly..
reviews.title: Superb Villa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Wow - this place is amazing

reviews.text: Romi villa is amazing and has the best views. There is a large lounge and kitchen area with very good equipment. There are 3 bedrooms, two twins and one double and also a cot and pull out bed if needed. The beds are a bit hard but apart from this the bedrooms are great, all with large balconies overlooking the sea. The villa has a very large driveway enough room for 2-3 cars, you will probably need to hire cars as the location is in Tragaki, just near the area of Tsillivi, which has all you shops and restaurants. There is also a swimming pool with sun loungers. The outside area is lovely with amazing views over the sea. I came to Zante for my wedding and if you are are large group of people i would recommend staying at all four of the villas. Romi villa in my opinion has the most amount of outdoor space and drive way. I would come back here again as was brilliant value for money.
reviews.title: Great Value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked Villa Kaly for three weeks in September as the place to stay prior to our wedding on the island and for our honeymoon afterwards. Although it worked out quite expensive for two of us, we hoped it would turn out to be well worth it.
reviews.title: Beautiful setting and quality accomodation

reviews.text: I'd been to Zante before and we chose it for our wedding because we knew people could get cheap flights and accommodation there from pretty much anywhere in the UK, but we also hoped we could find out own small, quiet undisturbed paradise.
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday!

aka: Mavrikos Luxury Villas - Romi, Klea, Kaly, Pearl Zakynthos/Tragaki, Greece
